## Caret functionality

* Some preprocessing (cleaning)
* Data splitting
* Training/testing functions
* Model comparison
* Some parallel processing

---

## Machine learning algorithms in R

* Linear discriminant analysis
* Regression
* Naive Bayes
* Support vector machines
* Classification and regression trees
* Random forests
* Boosting
* etc.
